metadata.title: DSA-3299-1 -- stunnel4 -- security update
metadata.description: Johan Olofsson discovered an authentication bypass vulnerability in Stunnel, a program designed to work as an universal SSL tunnel for network daemons. When Stunnel in server mode is used with the redirect option and certificate-based authentication is enabled with <q>verify = 2</q> or higher, then only the initial connection is redirected to the hosts specified with <q>redirect</q>. This allows a remote attacker to bypass authentication.
